tool_description: An API for retrieving world development indicators, that provides high-quality and internationally comparable statistics about global development for the past 60 years. The data contains 1400 indicators for 217 economies and more than 40 country groups. This API also provides a charts API that allows you to visualize data and compare different economies in different charts.
name: Word Bank World Development Indicators
title: Word Bank World Development Indicators

api_list.name: Line Chart
api_list.description: Line chart for given indicator and countries

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Comma separated country codes. Maximum 5 countries are allowed.

api_list.name: Bar Chart
api_list.description: Bar chart for given indicator and countries

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Comma separated country codes. A maximum of 5 countries are allowed.

api_list.name: Indicator Data
api_list.description: Get indicator data by country (region) code and indicator code. The indicator code can be found by querying indicators with keywords under `/indicators` endpoint.

api_list.name: Indicator Detail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-bank-world-development-indicators.p.rapidapi.com/indicators/NY.GDP.MKTP.CD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-bank-world-development-indicators.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://word-bank-world-development-indicators.p.rapidapi.com/indicators/{indicatorcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-bank-world-development-indicators.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Indicator List
api_list.description: List all indicators. The list is paginated and can be filtered with query parameters.
